com.netflix.paas.cassandra.provider

Interface KeyspaceClientProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultKeyspaceClientProvider

    public interface KeyspaceClientProvider
    Abstraction for getting a keyspace. The implementation will handle lifecycle management for the keyspace.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.netflix.astyanax.Keyspace acquireKeyspace(KeyspaceKey key)
      Get a keyspace by key.
      com.netflix.astyanax.Keyspace acquireKeyspace(java.lang.String schemaName)
      Get a keyspace by name.
      void releaseKeyspace(java.lang.String schemaName)
      Release a previously acquried keyspace

    • Method Detail

      • acquireKeyspace

        com.netflix.astyanax.Keyspace acquireKeyspace(java.lang.String schemaName)
        Get a keyspace by name. Will create one if one does not exist. The provider will internally keep track of references to the keyspace and will auto remove it once releaseKeyspace is called and the reference count goes down to 0.
        Parameters:
        keyspaceName - Globally unique keyspace name
        Returns:
        A new or previously created keyspace.

      • acquireKeyspace

        com.netflix.astyanax.Keyspace acquireKeyspace(KeyspaceKey key)
        Get a keyspace by key.
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:

      • releaseKeyspace

        void releaseKeyspace(java.lang.String schemaName)
        Release a previously acquried keyspace
        Parameters:
        keyspace -
